title: Lag spiking on pc
body: hello, i mainly play on my laptop with no worries at all. recently i have started playing on my brothers pc (he also plays lol, but hasnt for a month or so) to find lag spikes for no reason, i have even ran speedtest.com at the times of these episodes of lag just to get normal speeds.  is there anything i should be checking to try and resolve this problem?

replies.body: the problem acutally isnt he laptops connection it is the connection on the pc that is the problem. league has been installed on both machines for over a year.

Please use the "Reply" feature of the board so that I'm notified of your responses.

Are you still getting this issue with lag specifically? When you press ctrl+F (cmd+F on Mac), what's your average ping and FPS in a game?

It is possible that you're getting lag spikes because of the lower performance that a laptop would give. Everything is connected to each other in some way.

It could also be because of incorrectly configured internet settings. How long ago was League installed onto that laptop?
